metadata.subject: EU BANKS: BIG EQUITY OUTFLOWS BUT REMAIN UPBEAT ON REFLATION TRADE: SALES TOP PICKS = SOC GEN, INTESA, NORDEA

relationships.description: Sending financial market analysis and investment recommendations
Sending financial market analysis and investment recommendations
European Financials Specialist Sales at Bank of America Merrill Lynch

analysis.purpose: To provide financial market analysis and investment recommendations regarding European banks and the reflation trade
analysis.significance: Shows financial communications to Jeffrey Epstein containing professional investment analysis from Bank of America Merrill Lynch

notable_quotes: We remain positive on banks that can make acceptable returns in the current environment and are geared into the upside when rates begin to recover
The market is pricing a 16.6% probability of a EUR rate hike before the end of 2017
Euro area banks could see as much as €26bn in earnings uplift from a return of ECB rates to zero

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found - this is a standard professional financial analysis email

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed - this is legitimate financial market analysis and investment recommendations

public_knowledge.context: Standard financial market analysis that would be typical of institutional investment communications

analysis.summary: This email from a Bank of America Merrill Lynch representative provides financial market analysis on European banks, discussing equity outflows, the reflation trade, and investment recommendations for specific banking stocks, sent to Jeffrey Epstein and Richard Kahn.
